about_the_game:
In this game you have ninja supers and destroy asteroids in space. Its an immersive experience with unique levels, soundtracks and abilities.
And one other thing: you'll feel really cool!

Game has been tested only for Oculus Quest.

About the Gameplay: You will go on different space adventures in 3 different levels: Asteroid Fields, Red Rings and Harmonic Convergence.
Each will be entered via a Portal which you can access in the Main Menu. In each level you will fly through an asteroid field. Those asteroids can be destroyed - as detailed in the tutorial. Every destroyed asteroid will increase your score. The goal is to reach the Portal at the end of the level.

With every level completion you will unlock another level. When you have completed every level you will unlock an endless mode.
